text: Scientists discover new clue linking obesity to dementia risk - The Washington Post
fullText: European researchers trace a path that shows how high blood pressure caused by excess weight could be the link to certain cognitive brain disease.

text: ICE memo allows agents to enter homes without judge’s warrant, legal group says - The Washington Post

text: A vaccine trial is called 'unethical' and a 'unique' opportunity. Is it on or off? - NPR
fullText: The U.S. is giving $1.6 million to researchers to study how the hepatitis B vaccine affects newborns in Guinea-Bissau. Local officials say the trial is suspended. U.S. officials say that's inaccurate.

text: Harry Styles Announces 2026 Tour Dates, Including 30 Nights in New York City - Variety

text: Claude Code is suddenly everywhere inside Microsoft - The Verge
fullText: Microsoft is increasingly adopting Claude Code, despite selling its own GitHub Copilot AI tool. Microsoft’s developers are now testing out both to compare them.

fullText: The researchers examined the five leading causes of cancer death among the under-50 age group. They found that overall, from 1990 through 2023, more than 1.2 million people died of cancer in the United States before age 50, and the death rate fell by 44% duri…

text: GM to move production of China-built Buick SUV to U.S. plant - CNBC
